title: Saar Biotech-Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride, Sodium Citrate,  Ammonium Chloride and Menthol Suspension|Contract Manufacturing Pharma Company
meta:
SAAR BIOTECH exportes combination of Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride, Sodium Citrate,  Ammonium Chloride and  

Menthol Suspension.Diphenhydramine is an antihistamine that relieves congestion and post-nasal drips, while 

ammonium chloride is the expectorant which thins mucus. Sodium citrate is a mucolytic, an 

agent which breaks down mucus, so that coughing up phlegm is easier and Menthol helps clear
